description: This file defines tools for interacting with Discord via an agent, including initializing Discord tools, creating an agent, and performing various Discord operations such as sending messages, retrieving channel info, listing channels, and fetching message history.

classes.name: DiscordTools
classes.description: A class providing Discord-related functionalities, imported from agno.tools.discord.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class representing an agent that can perform tasks using various tools, imported from agno.agent.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method of the Agent class used to output responses based on instructions, streams, and responses.
